publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3809.1 Peter Peacock: Abolition of Council Taxâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-3809) in the name of Tommy Sheridan, leave out from first "believes" to end and insert "notes that the Local Government Committee, in its 6th Report 2002, Report on Inquiry into Local Government Finance, published in March last year, saw no merit in the Scottish service tax as outlined in evidence to it." Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr*
